name: lasciviousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that expresses a strong desire for sexual activity: He looked at her with lasciviousness. See
lascivious
More examplesFewer examplesTo this crowd, his lasciviousness did not seem to give offense.There is a great deal of lasciviousness that goes on.A slow fuse of lasciviousness smouldered in every phrase.Her mouth had the tempting lasciviousness he'd dreamed about so often.
